page.title: 11FARMING
page.content: The most popular crops grown in this area are oil seed,rape,wheat,barley and oats.Most of these are grown in the fields of the following farms in the area:Widdowson's farm,Dishley Grange,Rectory farm,Mitchell's Spring farm and three others,two of which are in Normanton.At Dishley Grange there are horses and sheep,but at the other farms there is not any cattle.The farm houses are much bigger than ordinary houses.Bedlam Barn Farm has three or four barns whereas the others have only two or three.
